recipe.title: Chicken Caesar Pasta Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 heads ; romaine lettuce, cut into 1-2 inch (3cm - 5cm) pieces
1 cup ; grape tomatoes, cut in half ; (200 g)

steps.step: Boil water, add the pasta, and cook according to package instructions. Drain water, and let the pasta chill.
Meanwhile, season each of the chicken breasts with 1 Tbsp. olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Grill for six to eight minutes on each side. Cut the chicken into bite-size pieces.
In a large bowl combine pasta, romaine lettuce, tomatoes, chicken, croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing. Toss gently.
